index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Fee Subtitle of the Seattle Municipal Code, amending Sections 22.901A.010, 22.901A.050, 22.901B.010, 22.901B.020, 22.901B.040, 22.901B.050, 22.901B.100, 22.901C.010, 22.901D, 22.901E.010, 22.901H.010, 22.901J.050, 22.901K.010, 22.901K.020, 22.901M.010, 22.901P.010, 22.901P.030, 22.901Q.010, 22.901R.010, and 22.901S.010; and adding a new Section 22.901L.050, to implement modifications to certain fees for reviewing and processing of applications for City permits, inspections, related actions of other City Departments, and other activities.
